WASI Rust tests.fd_filestat_get: Test case likely flawed as can get access timestamp for STDIN on Linux.
WASI Rust tests.interesting_paths: WAMR returns ENOTCAPABLE not EPERM for attempt to open absolute path in root folder, therefore test case flawed.
WASI Rust tests.close_preopen: WAMR does not currently support closing a pre-opened file descriptor, which is required for this test to work.
